content:
Here, take this <color=#8AAB4B>reward</color>.
I have no use for it anyway.
info: 幻雪友邻任务-交付虫任务_

content:
Look at the unique patterns on this <color=#8AAB4B>{任务物品}</color>,
Such masterful craftsmanship of nature,
It's absolutely fascinating!
info: 幻雪友邻任务-交付虫任务_

content:
Such remarkable speed—
No wonder you can catch butterflies with such ease!
info: 幻雪友邻任务-交付虫任务_

content:
Let me carefully examine this <color=#8AAB4B>{任务物品}</color>...
So the punches can be thrown like this, and like that,
Hmm yes, and then...
info: 幻雪友邻任务-交付虫任务_

content:
Oh, <color=#d3b037>{Pnickname}</color>,
have you found something?
info: 幻雪友邻任务-交付虫任务_

content:
I apologize for the trouble,
I'll take good care of this butterfly, don't worry.
As a token of my gratitude, please accept this <color=#8AAB4B>thank-you gift</color>!
info: 幻雪友邻任务-交付虫任务_

content:
Oh, that's quite alright.
If you think the butterflies will be fine,
you may proceed as you see fit.
info: 幻雪友邻任务-交付虫任务_

content:
Hmm? You took it back!
Could it be that this anticipation of receiving something...
Was the surprise you prepared for me all along?
info: 幻雪友邻任务-交付虫任务_

content: How swift! You truly are a master at catching butterflies,\nI was right to entrust this to you!
info: 幻雪友邻任务-交付虫任务_

content:
...
Well, the experiment failed~ Yeep~
info: 幻雪友邻任务-交付虫任务_

content:
Oh, are you worried?
I'll do my best to keep them alive.
Abnormal vitality will always fade away.
info: 幻雪友邻任务-交付虫任务_

content: Well then, please accept this <color=#8AAB4B>token of gratitude</color> as your reward for helping me capture those mask spirits!
info: 幻雪友邻任务-交付虫任务_

content:
...(思考)This butterfly,
something seems off about it.
No matter, I shall take it back for examination.
info: 幻雪友邻任务-交付虫任务_

content:
Thank you in advance, here's a <color=#8AAB4B>token of gratitude</color> for you!
Let me see here, hmm hmm, these little things...
Don't worry, I don't eat these.
info: 幻雪友邻任务-交付虫任务_

content:
It's the <color=#8AAB4B>{任务物品}</color>!
No time to explain, I must... I must...
Achoo!
info: 幻雪友邻任务-交付虫任务_
幻雪友邻任务-交付虫任务_

content:
Already finished?
<size=30>You're way faster than me!</size>
Quick, let me see!
info: 幻雪友邻任务-交付虫任务_

content:
Hold on—
I'm studying "martial arts,"
but theoretically butterflies only have legs?!
info: 幻雪友邻任务-交付虫任务_
幻雪友邻任务-交付虫任务_

content:
Here's a <color=#8AAB4B>thank-you gift</color> for you,
Thank you for helping me catch bugs, how delightful~.
info: 幻雪友邻任务-交付虫任务_

content:
Hm? You won't give it to me?
W-why not...{紧张}
info: 幻雪友邻任务-交付虫任务_

content:
Yeep? You caught it already?
This truly exemplifies the saying "choosing the right method is half the battle," doesn't it?~
info: 幻雪友邻任务-交付虫任务_

content:
Oh, never mind that for now.
Here, this <color=#8AAB4B>gift</color>, yes, a gift!
Please do accept it!
info: 幻雪友邻任务-交付虫任务_

content:
This is exactly the insect I was looking for!
<color=#d3b037>{Pnickname}</color>, with your assistance,
I'm certain the plants in my little courtyard will flourish for much longer~.
info: 幻雪友邻任务-交付虫任务_

content:
...Hmph, just as I expected of you~
You actually put away your pocket in front of me?!
info: 幻雪友邻任务-交付虫任务_

content:
Hmm, is this insect unhealthy,
is that why you won't give it to me?
info: 幻雪友邻任务-交付虫任务_
